import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react' import './WriteNewBlog.css' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { MdOutlineArrowBackIos } from 'react-icons/md' const WriteNewBlog = (props) => { const heading = useRef(); const author = useRef(); const para = useRef(); const [showButton, setShowButton] = useState(truue) const navigate = useNavigate(); const createSubmitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if(heading.length === 0){ setShowButton(!showButton) } const newBlogPost = { head: heading.current.value, author: author.current.value, para: para.current.value } props.value(newBlogPost) navigate('/home') } return (
